definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ps 45:2 enumerator, muster-officer, secretary, scribe (prop. pt. of [[סָפַר]]; Aram. [[סַפְרָא]], sopro0 id. cf. spiyr doctus, literatus; O Aram. [[ספרא]] id., Lzb:330 Cook:85; Ph. [[ספר]] Lzb:330);—abs. [[סׂפֵר]] Ju Jdg 5:14 +, [[סוֹפֵר]] 2Sa 8:17 +; cstr. [[סׂפֵר]] 2Ki 12:11 + 2 t., + Je 52:25 (Gie GFM rd. ´[[הַסּ]] as ‖ 2Ki 25:19); pl. [[סׂפְרִים]] 1Ki 4:3, Je 8:8, ´[[סוֹ]] 1Ch 2:55, 34:13; cstr. [[סׂפְרֵי]] Es 3:12, Es 8:9; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: enumerator, muster-officer in description of leaders of Isr. ´[[משְׁכִים בְּשֵׁבֶט ס]] Ju Jdg 5:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: king's official = secretary 2Sa 8:17 = 2Sa 20:25 = 1Ch 18:16, 2Ki 18:18, 2Ki 18:37 = Is 36:3, Is 36:22; Sol. had two 1Ki 4:3 (in all these disting. from [[מַזְכִּיר]]); also 2Ki 19:2 = Is 37:2, Je 36:10, Je 36:12, cf. ´[[לִשְׁכַּת הַסּ]] v:Je 36:12, v:Je 36:20, v:Je 36:21, ´[[בֵּית הַסּ]] Je 37:15, Je 37:20; acting as treasurer and paymaster 2Ki 12:11 = 2Ch 24:11, —cf. Zadok Ne 13:13; —2Ki 22:3, 2Ki 22:8, 2Ki 22:9, 2Ki 22:10, 2Ki 22:12 = 2Ch 34:15, 2Ch 34:18, 2Ch 34:20; 1Ch 24:6 (Levite); [[שַׂר הַצָּבָא]] ´[[הַסּ]] 2Ki 25:19 = Je 52:25 (si vera l. in K) implies military authority (but ´[[שַׂר הַצּ]] perh. gloss GFM:Ju 5, 14); Ew Sta al. read (as Je) scribe of general.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: in Persia, secretaries who wrote out (king's) decrees, acc. to Es 3:12, Es 8:9.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: 2Ch 26:11 uses ´[[ס]] for muster-officer; 1Ch 2:55 mentions families of [[סוֹפְרִים]]; 2Ch 34:13 knows ´[[ס]] as Levites; ´[[ס]] 1Ch 27:32 = man of learning.

professional class of learned men, ‘ scribes ’ able to read and write Je 36:26, Je 36:32; with writing implements, ´[[מָהִיר עֵט ס]] Ps 45:2, ´[[קֶסֶת הַסּ]] Ez Eze 9:2, Eze 9:3, ´[[תַּעַר הַסּ]] Je 36:23; esp. learned in the law, and assuming to issue its precepts, [[עֵט שֶׁקֶר סׂפְרִים]] Je 8:8.

specif. of Ezra, at once priest ([[כּׂהֵן]]) and learned in the law ([[סׂפֵר]]), Ezr 7:11, ´[[דִּבְרֵי מִחְוֹת י]] ´[[ס]] v:Ezr 7:11 [cf. Aram. v:Ezr 7:12, v:Ezr 7:21], [[מָהִיר בְּתוֹרֵת משֶׁה]] ´[[ס]] v:Ezr 7:6; Ne 8:1, Ne 8:4, Ne 8:9, Ne 8:13, Ne 12:26, Ne 12:36.
